name: Daily Mood Tracker-React JS
desc: A Daily Mood Tracker app made with React.js lets users log and monitor their moods, providing visual insights into emotional patterns over time, all within an intuitive, responsive interface.

name: Nxt Trendz-React JS
desc: Nxt Trendz is a React.js-based e-commerce website clone offering a seamless shopping experience with secure payments and real-time inventory management.

name: NxtWatch-React JS
desc: NxtWatch is a React.js-based YouTube clone offering a smooth video streaming experience with features like video recommendations, search functionality, and user authentication.

name: Jobby App-React JS
desc: Jobby is a LinkedIn clone built with React.js, featuring professional networking, job postings, and user profiles for career development and connections.

name: IPL Dashboard App-React JS
desc: The IPL Dashboard App is a React.js-based clone that offers real-time updates, stats, and insights on IPL matches, teams, and players, replicating the functionality of popular cricket dashboards.

name: My Tasks-React JS
desc: Your task app, My Task, is a to-do list application built with React.js, designed to help users manage and organize their tasks efficiently with features like adding, editing, and tracking tasks.
